summary: eBay is a huge online marketplace where people buy and sell all sorts of things. It was started in 1995 by Pierre Omidyar and is based in California, USA. With over 132 million active buyers, it's like a global garage sale! You can find almost anything on eBay, from clothes to cars, and even some unusual items. People can bid on items in auctions or buy them instantly. eBay makes money by charging sellers a small fee when their items sell. It's a popular way for individuals and businesses to trade online, with a reputation system to help ensure trust between buyers and sellers.
title: EBay
